name: Super-hero City Rescue Mission
description:
Our rescue man moves from the jungle and transforms into city hero to help innocent people against bad enemies! Now be a city Hero and rescue the fellows in danger who need your help and save them all. User your super power skills and fly high to rescue the nation. Your country needs you, aliens and robotic nation from other planets is trying to invade your country/ this is the best time to help your fellow nation.


Game Features:
Real Gangster Crime City Environment
Flying Hero Fighting with City Mafia Gang
Intense Strange Hero vs Gangster Fighting Missions
Realistic sound effects
